dialogue.text: What am I? I am the one who learned to love the question.

visual_elements.waiting_room: Filled with memories of past visits

psychological_notes: Ultimate transformation—Evan's relationship with the existential question has completely inverted. From torment to love, from problem to companion, from wound to window. He no longer needs the architect because the work is complete. Identity accepted as verb rather than noun.
philosophical_underpinning: Love as the ultimate relationship with mystery
therapeutic_direction: Therapeutic journey complete—client has internalized the process
